column4: man, does no one use !command > person any more? it just pollutes the channel
No it doesn't.  There may be others who might find the information helpful.  It helps take the load off of the bot.
load? you must be joking. haven't seen too many !commands go by to justify the 4-6 lines worth of spam ubottu produces per !command
Actually, your offtopic rant about it, filled with negativeness is much more pollutant. I suggest you reconsider that concept.
